TopicTitle: Some discussion about multiplayer games（I'm using machine translation）

Articles.Content:
在开始之前，请注意我使用的是机器翻译，这可能会导致阅读障碍，但文章效果很好

坎巴拉太空计划2已经发售，你对在线多人游戏有什么想法吗？

我个人希望做一个类似GTA5和单人游戏结合的模式，就是有公服务器，任何人都可以进入发射火箭对接（这个服务器也类似于官方维护的GTA5），最后几台服务器可以记录下来，内置的火箭也可以在玩家下线后保存， 以便玩家下次登录时可以继续构建。

另一种是私有的，可以像单人游戏一样连接到局域网，玩家可以创建房间不受干扰地与朋友一起玩

如果您有任何建议，请随时说出来

[Moderator added translation]

Before starting, please note that I am using machine translation, which may cause dyslexia, but the article works well Kerbal Space Program 2 is out, do you have any thoughts on online multiplayer?

I personally hope to make a mode similar to the combination of GTA5 and single-player games, that is, there is a public server, and anyone can enter the launch rocket docking (this server is also similar to the officially maintained GTA5), and the last few servers can be recorded. The built-in Rockets can also be saved after the player goes offline so that the player can continue building the next time they log in. The other is private and can be connected to a local area network like a single player game, players can create rooms to play with friends without interruption Feel free to speak up if you have any suggestions
